thread_title: Server Stats - An open Source Bot

messages.raw_content:

Whether you manage a gaming community, a development hub, or a support server, this bot gives your members a clear view of your serverâ€™s activity â€” without lifting a finger.

âœ… Real-Time Updates â€“ Channels auto-update on user join, bot join, role creation, and version changes.
âœ… Set It and Forget It â€“ Once installed, the bot handles everything in the background â€” no commands needed.
âœ… Clean Design â€“ Stats are shown in read-only voice channels under a dedicated "Server Stats" category â€” visible to all, usable by none.

## ğŸ§¾ How It Works
This forum is open to **any member** who wants to promote their bot for free.
Just create a post using the **template below** and tag it properly.

---

## ğŸ§© Posting Guidelines
1. **Use a clear title** (bot name or core function).
2. **Include a description** highlighting what your bot does.
3. **List key features** in bullet points (what makes it special?).
4. **Attach a thumbnail** to make your post pop. (Ideal size: 1280x780 px)
4. **Include your botâ€™s invite link.**

---

## ğŸ·ï¸ Tag It Right
Select up to **5 tags** that describe your bot (e.g., Music, Moderation, Utility, etc.).

---

## ğŸš« Rules
* **NSFW, scam, nuke, crypto,** and **malware bots** are **strictly prohibited.**
* **No reposting** the same bot over and over. One active listing per bot.
* Keep your posts respectful, honest, and clear.

### âš ï¸ Violators may be warned, muted, or banned depending on the case.
